name: Project Unison Alpha
description:
Project Unions is an Open World Action Adventure, were you take part in the Unison Project. This prototype contains 6 animals from the first map, and is a game-play prototype for the basic mechanics, crafting, taming, and fighting the animals on the map.

If you like what you see, I would love to have you in the discord server. I'll be giving updates on progress and other info that comes up about the game. Thanks for downloading, hope you enjoy!

https://discord.gg/cwaHeSgR
